alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 11 at 5:53PM CST until February 12 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 11 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will continue to improve over the next few hours in the Red River Valley. However, areas of intermittent low visibility due to blowing snow remain possible at times, so continue to use caution when traveling.
info.instruction: Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing.
